projects.name: Data Privacy Map
description: Collaborated with a team of four to develop an interactive data privacy map, utilizing the MERN stack.
Provides comprehensive insights into data privacy laws across the United States and globally.
Integrated client feedback and suggestions in the web app.

projects.name: Deadwood the digital board game
description: Worked on a team of three to implement a digital version of the board game Deadwood.
Translated the complex rules and gameplay mechanics of the physical board game into a digital experience.
Developed a user-friendly and visually appealing interface using JavaFX, including game boards, player pieces, cards, and interactive components, providing an immersive gaming experience.
Added sound effects and animations to enhance the gaming experience and create a dynamic atmosphere.

about:
Hi my name is Thai Nguyen! ðŸ‘‹
I'm a budding web developer and Computer Science student at Western Washington University.
I like to build engaging websites and make cool apps using AI tools like Azure Computer Vision
and Vertex AI. In the past, I was a math and computer science tutor at Western, helping students
better understand concepts taught in their classes. I'm currently working for Western's
Web Communications Technology team to build web pages and web apps that will help the university.
When I'm not in class or at work, you can find me playing pickleball, disc golf, or trying new recipes.

experience.title: Web Developer III
description: Worked with various Content Management Systems like WordPress and Drupal to convert PDF files to web pages for procedures and policies.
Utilized SiteImprove to guarantee quality assurance and comply with accessibility guidelines.
Created a web app that utilizes AI to generates descriptive alternative text for uploaded images.

experience.title: Web Development Intern
description: Revise Western Washington University's user-facing content to comply with W3C accessibility standards.
Evaluate existing technologies employed by the university for reporting and, where feasible, addressing accessibility concerns.
Develop standalone web application utilizing AI to generate descriptive alternative text.

experience.title: Math Center Tutor
